response.overview: An average teenager who lives in an ordinary city embarks on an adventure that takes him across three realms. The first world represents his house and close friends. The second depicts society and its battle for survival. He grew up in the community where he was viewed as inferior. His school experience wasn’t his best time as he was constantly bullied and underwent changes due to puberty. The proper sex education wasn’t provided by his school. The violence and indifference he witnessed in two worlds piqued his interest in discovering his own world of freedom and harmony. At one point, the pressure incoming from two worlds has finalized his decision to proceed his new journey into the third world.
response.title: The 144th
